00012 void generateXML(MavenCompiler* c) {
00013         // handles
00014         ofstream xml;
00015         xml.open("docs.xml");
00016         
00017         // header
00018         xml << "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"ISO-8859-1\"?>" << endl;
00019         
00020         // namespaces
00021         for(int i = 0; i < c->namespaces->length(); ++i) {
00022                 xml << "<namespace name=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).name << "\">" << endl;
00023                 xml << "  <doc><![CDATA[" << c->namespaces->at(i).doc.body << "]]></doc>" << endl;
00024                 
00025                 for(int j = 0; j < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->length(); ++j) {
00026                         xml << "  <class name=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->name
00027                         << "\" line=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->line << "\" isAbstract=\""
00028                         << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->isAbstract) << "\" isFinal=\""
00029                         << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->isFinal) << "\">" << endl;
00030                         xml << "    <doc><![CDATA[" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->doc.body << "]]></doc>" << endl;
00031                         
00032                         // variables
00033                         for(int k = 0; k < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->length(); ++k) {
00034                                 xml << "    <variable type=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).type
00035                                 << "\" name=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).name
00036                                 << "\" line=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).atLine
00037                                 << "\" isPublic=\"" << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).isPublic)
00038                                 << "\" isStatic=\"" << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).isStatic) << "\">" << endl;
00039                                 xml << "      <doc><![CDATA[" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->variables->at(k).doc.body << "]]></doc>" << endl;
00040                                 xml << "    </variable>" << endl;
00041                         }
00042                         
00043                         // functions
00044                         for(int k = 0; k < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->length(); ++k) {
00045                                 xml << "    <function returnType=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).returnType
00046                                 << "\" name=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).name
00047                                 << "\" line=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).atLine
00048                                 << "\" isPublic=\"" << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).isPublic)
00049                                 << "\" isStatic=\"" << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).isStatic)
00050                                 << "\" isExternal=\"" << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).isExternal)
00051                                 << "\" isAliasSystem=\"" << sqlSafe(c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).alias_system)
00052                                 << "\">" << endl;
00053                                 xml << "      <alias>" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).alias << "</alias>" << endl;
00054                                 xml << "      <doc><![CDATA[" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).doc.body << "]]></doc>" << endl;
00055                                 xml << "      <arguments>" << endl;
00056                                 
00057                                 for(int l = 0; l < c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).args.length(); ++l) {
00058                                         xml << "        <argument type=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).args[l].type
00059                                                 << "\" name=\"" << c->namespaces->at(i).objects->at(j)->functions->at(k).args[l].name << "\" />" << endl;
00060                                 }
00061                                 
00062                                 xml << "      </arguments>" << endl;
